title: The amazing AirPods Pro 2 just hit the lowest price of 2025
content:
Macworld

With summer rapidly approaching, it’s time to stop putting off upgrading your earbuds and just order the AirPods Pro 2 already! That’s because they just hit their 2025 low: Amazon is selling the AirPods Pro 2 for just $169, a massive savings of more than 30 percent off the $249 MSRP.

These earbuds are easily one of our favorites, as the 4.5-star rating we gave them hasn’t changed since 2022. As we mentioned back then, the AirPods Pro 2 earbuds still deliver fantastic audio quality, are excellent at noise canceling, and have a “best-in-class” transparency mode.

“On the outside, not much has changed with these second-generation AirPods Pro. But the sound quality has improved a lot, noise cancelling is much better, transparency mode is top-notch, and battery life is finally up to par. There’s not a lot here you can’t find on other models, but Apple makes it easy and has caught up to its fierce competition,” the review reads.

And they’ve only gotten better since then. Through a steady stream of updates, Apple has made the AirPods Pro 2 even better since their release, with Conversation Boost and Hearing Protection, which lets you test your hearing with AirPods Pro and use them as an actual hearing aid. Plus, you’ll get all the great Apple ecosystem stuff you love: instant pairing, hands-free Siri support, notification announcements, and more.

So, go get your own Apple AirPods Pro 2 for $169 while Amazon still has them on sale.
